sentence.value: Bertalan Farkas (born August 2, 1949) was the first Hungarian cosmonaut and the first Esperantist in space.

sentence.value: Farkas, along with Soviet cosmonaut Valeri Kubasov, was launched into space on Soyuz 36 from Baikonur Cosmodrome on May 26, 1980, at 18:20 (GMT).
sentence.annotated-sentence: [[Farkas|Bertalan_Farkas]], along with [[Soviet|Soviet_Union]] [[cosmonaut|Astronaut]] [[Valeri Kubasov|Valeri_Kubasov]], was launched into [[space|Astronaut]] on [[Soyuz 36|Soyuz_36]] from [[Baikonur Cosmodrome|Baikonur_Cosmodrome]] on [[May 26 , 1980 ,|Akron,_Ohio]]t [[18:20|Gospel_of_Matthew]] (GMT).
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Farkas|Bertalan_Farkas]], along with [[Soviet|Soviet_Union]] [[cosmonaut|Astronaut]] [[Valeri Kubasov|Valeri_Kubasov]], was launched into [[space|Astronaut]] on [[Soyuz 36|Soyuz_36]] from [[Baikonur Cosmodrome|Baikonur_Cosmodrome]] on May 26, 1980, at 18:20 (GMT).

sentence.value: After 7 days, 20 hours and 45 minutes, and having completed 124 orbits, Farkas and Kubasov returned to Earth, landing 140 km southeast of Dzhezkazgan.
